nl.sense_os.service.storage

Class SQLiteStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.sense_os.service.storage.SQLiteStorage

  • public class SQLiteStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages a store for sensor data points in a persistent SQLite database. Helper class for LocalStorage.
    Author:
    Steven Mulder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int QUERY_RESULTS_LIMIT
      Limit for number of query results
      static int QUERY_RESULTS_LIMIT_EPI_MODE
      Limit for number of query results in epi-mode (very low because epi mode data points can be huge)
